fixed_skill.desc: Restore 1 ally's HP equal to 32.7%/34.3%/36.0% of Attack + 989/1224/1477. Gain 2 Lotus stacks for 1 turn. While user has Lotus, after each enemy and ally action, when an ally's HP is below 50%, spend 1 Lotus stack to restore HP equal to 8.4%/8.8%/9.2% of Attack + 254/314/379.
fixed_skill.name: Flowers of the Pure Land

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase Defense by 29.4% for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Defense Master IV

innate_skill.desc: Restore party's HP by 19.0/20.0/20.9% of Attack + 575/711/858.
innate_skill.name: Mediarahan

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing by 20.9%. When healing with Lotus, increase max HP of allies healed by 13% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Lotus Dance

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing by 20.9%. When healing with Lotus, increase max HP of allies healed by 14.5% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Lotus Dance I

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing by 20.9%. For 2 turns, when healing with Lotus, increase healed allies' max HP by 16% and healing from Lotus by 40%.
passive_skill.name: Lotus Dance II

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing by 20.9%. For 2 turns, when healing with Lotus, increase healed allies' max HP by 17.5% and healing from Lotus by 45%.
passive_skill.name: Lotus Dance III

showtime_skill.desc: Restore HP to party equal to 48.6%/52.0%/55.4% Attack + 1471/1854/2275.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
